name: Baby/Khenzie
wishText: happy birthday baby. today is all about you, and i just want you to know how grateful i am to have you in my life. thank you for being you, for loving me the way you do, and for staying even when things get hard. you make my days lighter, my mind calmer, and my heart feel at home. i hope today reminds you how special you are, not just to me but to everyone who gets to know you. i’m so proud of the woman you’re becoming, and i’ll always be here to support you, celebrate you, and grow with you. i love you so much, baby. enjoy your day, you deserve all the love and happiness today and always.
